channel.title: Help adding a cmmand
channel.description: i need to add a pickup command you have any ideas plase i need help

item.title: Help adding a cmmand
item.dc:creator: @redneck97 redneck97
item.description:
@redneck97 wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }
add with outher commands

::pickup (itemid) (howmanny)

Read full topic

item.title: Help adding a cmmand
item.dc:creator: @Java_Owns Java Owns
item.description:
@Java_Owns wrote:

Dunno if this will work but here goes,

else if (command.startsWith("######") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(####,#); addItem(####,#); addItem(####,#); addItem(####,#); addItem(####,#); addItem(####,#); }

… If you want less or more items copy and paste this

		addItem(####,#);

at the bottom of

		addItem(####,#);

or delete some

		addItem(####,#);

Read full topic
